attributes.title: Lannister guardsman
attributes.actor: Conor DelaneyA '''Lannister guardsman''' is an unnamed minor character in the Season 1

attributes.link: House Lannister:''For similar articles see Lannister soldier.''Character

sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, it is [[Jory Cassel]] who reports being unable to find Nymeria, having helped Arya to drive the direwolf away.
sections.Biography:
===[[Season 1]]===
He leads the Lannister guardsmen who accompany King [[Robert Baratheon|Robert]]'s party to [[Winterfell]] and back. On the return journey Prince [[Joffrey Baratheon|Joffrey]] is bitten by the [[Direwolves|direwolf]] [[Nymeria]]. He leads a search for the wolf and reports his inability to find her to the King. When Queen [[Cersei Lannister|Cersei]] demands that [[Sansa Stark|Sansa]]'s direwolf [[Lady]] be killed in her place he reports that Lady is chained up outside the [[Inn at the Crossroads]].<ref>"[[The Kingsroad]]"</ref>
